thread.title: This Week: Italy's government and oil in the spotlight

title: This Week: Italy's government and oil in the spotlight
text:
This Week: Italy's government and oil in the spotlight 2:44pm EDT - 01:51
After last week's oil price peak, pressure will remain on import heavy economies. Investors will also be cautiously watching Italy, and whether plans from its anti-establishment parties will put it on a collision course with the EU. Ciara Lee reports.
